Content Manager

Manage blog posts and content for William64.com

Quick Start

The Keystatic CMS allows you to create, edit, and manage blog posts directly from your browser. 

# To use Keystatic CMS locally:
npm run dev

# Then open:
# http://localhost:4321/admin

Manual Editing

You can also add posts directly by creating MDX files in src/content/posts/.

Frontmatter Required:

---
title: "Your Post Title"
publishedDate: "2025-12-25"
summary: "Brief description for SEO"
category: "Technical Tutorials"
tags: ["Tag1", "Tag2"]
featured: false
---

# Your Content

Available Categories

  • Technical Tutorials
  • Industry Insights
  • Case Studies
  • Retro Tech
